text:
@HouseGOP How about you "work" to get passed the myriad billscollecting dust on #MoscowMitch's desk?

How about you "work" to ensure our frontline healthcare workers have the proper protection as they treat covid-19 patients?

WHERE ARE THE GODDAMN TESTS???

DO YOUR DAMN JOB!
